pull.title: Update src/secp256k1 subtree to upstream release v0.3.0
pull.body: This updates the libsecp256k1 subtree to [v0.3.0](https://github.com/bitcoin-core/secp256k1/releases/tag/v0.3.0). I don't believe there are code changes that are particularly important to Bitcoin Core, apart from the added CMake build system support.

events.body:
<!--e57a25ab6845829454e8d69fc972939a-->

The following sections might be updated with supplementary metadata relevant to reviewers and maintainers.

<!--021abf342d371248e50ceaed478a90ca-->
### Reviews
See [the guideline](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md#code-review) for information on the review process.
| Type | Reviewers |
| ---- | --------- |
| ACK | [jonasnick](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/27230#pullrequestreview-1332537640), [fanquake](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/27230#pullrequestreview-1336044024) |
| Concept ACK | [real-or-random](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/27230#pullrequestreview-1331628434) |

If your review is incorrectly listed, please react with 👎 to this comment and the bot will ignore it on the next update.
<!--174a7506f384e20aa4161008e828411d-->
### Conflicts
Reviewers, this pull request conflicts with the following ones:

* [#24545](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/24545) (BIP324: Enable v2 P2P encrypted transport by dhruv)
* [#23561](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/23561) (BIP324: Handshake prerequisites by dhruv)
* [#23432](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/23432) (BIP324: CKey encode/decode to elligator-swift by dhruv)

If you consider this pull request important, please also help to review the conflicting pull requests. Ideally, start with the one that should be merged first.
